document.full_text: former illinois governor rod blagojevich erupted in profanity when he learned in 2008 that president barack obama was not willing to offer a plum job such as a cabinet post in return for an appointment to obama's senate seat, according to trial testimony on wednesday.
document.title: blagojevich irked obama didn't offer plum post for seat
lines_and_colors: former illinois governor rod blagojevich erupted in profanity when he learned in 2008 that president barack obama was not willing to offer a plum job such as a cabinet post in return for an appointment to obama's senate seat, according to trial testimony on wednesday.
